head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MULDOON, THOMAS W.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MULDOON, THOMAS W.

block.p: MULDOON-Thomas W. The Officers and members of the Alumni Association of the New York Eye & Ear Infirmary are saddened by the passing of Thomas W. Muldoon, father of esteemed member and Surgeon Director, Thomas O. Muldoon, MD. We extend our heartfelt condolences to the Muldoon family. Jeanne L. Rosenthal, MD, Pres. Solomon Liebowitz, MD, Past-Pres Melissa Pashcow, MD, Vice Pres. Douglas Buxton, MD, Secretary

MULDOON-Thomas W. The Officers and members of the Alumni Association of the New York Eye & Ear Infirmary are saddened by the passing of Thomas W. Muldoon, father of esteemed member and Surgeon Director, Thomas O. Muldoon, MD. We extend our heartfelt condolences to the Muldoon family. Jeanne L. Rosenthal, MD, Pres. Solomon Liebowitz, MD, Past-Pres Melissa Pashcow, MD, Vice Pres. Douglas Buxton, MD, Secretary
